Title: How to run code coverage of .NET code on Azure DevOps
Description: Learn how to measure .NET code coverage on Azure DevOps using XPlat Code Coverage and ReportGenerator. Includes full pipeline and practical tips.

Title: Owls in Towels
Description: Wildlife rehabilitators often wrap owls in fabric so they can be weighed, treated, and fed. If not, the owls get in a flap.
